events.title: Good Reads & Slow Sips: March Book Club
events.description: Take a break, grab a cozy seat, and chat with fellow book lovers over coffee. This month, we’re diving into 'Stolen Focus' by Johann Hari—an eye-opening read about attention, distraction, and the modern world. Whether you’ve finished the book or just want to listen, come share your thoughts and connect!

agenda.activity: Welcome & Order Drinks – Grab your favorite beverage and get comfy
Book Discussion – Thoughts on 'Stolen Focus' and how it relates to our lives
Open Book Picks – Suggest and vote for next month’s read
Casual Conversations – Chat about books, life, and everything in between

bring: A copy of 'Stolen Focus' (if you have one)
Your thoughts, experiences, or favorite takeaways
A book recommendation for next month (optional)

events.title: Tech Workshop: Connect & Learn
events.description: Learn about the latest technologies and programming languages. Bring your laptop for hands-on exercises.

agenda.activity: Tech Trends 2025 - AI, Web3, and the future of coding
Hands-on Coding - Team up & build a mini project
Open Discussion - Share insights, ideas & Q&A
Conversations & Refreshments - Unwind & connect with others
